name: To The Boys
description:
To The Boys - is an infinite 3d runner game that interprets the sentence "Joined Together" a bit differently! Use arrow keys to control the player, spacebar/left mouse button to step through cutscenes. More stuff coming soon!

To run on Windows, download the .exe and .pck files in the same folder and run the .exe!

CREDITS:

Ucrash (Ucrash#2105 on discord) - programming, 3d animation, 2d art, level design

yetanotherusername#5991 on discord - 3d modelling, 3d animation, programming

Spide (Спайд#6987 on discord) - programming, level design

Spacedan (Just_Spacedan#2005 on discord) - music
